Title: Exempting certain capital projects undertaken by a municipality jointly with another municipal corporation from the spending tax cap
Summary: Exempts certain capital projects undertaken by a municipality jointly with another municipal corporation from the spending tax cap.
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to exempting certain capital projects undertaken by a municipality jointly with another municipal corporation from the spending tax cap
